While MongoDB Atlas clusters are protected

body.content:
ORGANIZATION
FYP's Org - 2023-10-10
PROJECT
Project 0
 

This is an informational notice to ensure you're aware that you've added "Allow access from anywhere (0.0.0.0/0)" to your Network Permission List.

While MongoDB Atlas clusters are protected by authentication, it is important to ensure that strong credentials (username and password) are used for all database users, particularly when allowing access from anywhere.

If you believe adding access from anywhere was done in error, please navigate to https://cloud.mongodb.com/v2/652503fe4694f86e11c032b8#/security/network/accessList to change your Network Permission List settings.

This message was sent from MongoDB, Inc., 1633 Broadway, 38th floor, NY, NY 10019

value.subject: Welcome to MongoDB FYP!
value.bodyPreview:
Here are a few resources to help you get started.



Welcome to MongoDB

FYP!



Ready to dive into MongoDB Atlas? Just complete these four steps and you'll have your MongoDB cluster up and running.

  1.  Create cluster
  2.  Add IP address

body.content:
Here are a few resources to help you get started.

 

Welcome to MongoDB

FYP!  

 

Ready to dive into MongoDB Atlas? Just complete these four steps and you'll have your MongoDB cluster up and running.

  1. Create cluster
  2. Add IP address to access list
  3. Create a user
  4. Connect to cluster

Ready to start building? Populate your newly-created cluster with some of our sample datasets. Great for testing and quick prototyping!

 

Get started
 

Or check out this 6 minute video where we'll guide you through your cluster setup.

 

Advantages of the document model

 

Instead of storing data in fixed rows and columns, documents offer a variety of advantages, including:

  • An intuitive data model that is fast and easy to work with.
  • A flexible schema that allows for your data model to evolve as needs change.
  • The ability to horizontally scale out.
Read more

 

Copyright © 2023 MongoDB, All rights reserved.

1633 Broadway, Floor 38, New York, NY 10019
Click here to unsubscribe 

 

View in browser

value.subject: Try these easy ways to get started with Azure
value.bodyPreview:
Find resources to help you start working in Azure today.


View as a webpage






Create workloads and manage your Azure account.

Azure Portal ❯

Azure Portal ❯



Getting started is easy



You can do a lot with free compute, netw

body.content:
Find resources to help you start working in Azure today.
                                                           

View as a webpage

 
 
 

Create workloads and manage your Azure account.

Azure Portal ❯
 
Azure Portal ❯
 
 

Getting started is easy

 

You can do a lot with free compute, network, storage, and databases, all included with your Azure free account. To learn about Azure services and get started building your ideas, browse documentation that includes how-to guides, tutorials, example code, videos, and training.

Explore documentation
 
 
 
 
 

Go to the Azure portal to build, deploy, and manage your cloud applications. Here are a few ways to start working in Azure:

 
 

Build a  web app with Java, .NET, Node.js, Python, or PHP.

 
 

Provision a Linux or Windows virtual machine.

 
 

Create a relational or NoSQL database.

 
 

Accelerate your development using a serverless function.

 
 
 
 
 

Manage Azure resources from your mobile device

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Azure Portal
 
Documentation
 
Training
 
Support
 
 

Questions? Get started with the Azure Demo Series and register for a live Q&A with an Azure technical expert

 
 

Account information

 

Subscription ID: b8395ecf-394b-4ef0-9928-e1001ed8bcfc

 
 
 
 
 
 

This email was sent from an unmonitored inbox.

 
Privacy Statement
 

Microsoft Corporation, One Microsoft Way, Redmond, WA 98052

Welcome to Azure, FYP

body.content:
Get started with free amounts of services and USD200 credit.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Go to the portal >
You have 30 days left to use your credit. Check your remaining credit >

Welcome to Azure, FYP

Build your next idea with 12 months of free services and a USD200* credit. Start working in Azure now, with documentation that includes sample code, tutorials, quickstarts, and how-to guides.

Explore documentation >

Understand cloud fundamentals

Learn at your own pace with this in-depth, online course on core cloud concepts.

Take the course >

Get long-term value from the cloud

Set your organization up for success in Azure. Take this short course on estimating and managing future costs.

Take the course >

*Depending on the country in which you sign up for your Azure free account, you may receive this credit in a specified local currency.

Privacy Statement

Microsoft Corporation, One Microsoft Way, ​Redmond, WA 98052​

value.subject: Welcome to your new Outlook.com account
value.bodyPreview:
Hi FYP,
Welcome to your Outlook! We're the email service designed to help you conquer your day. Connect, organize, and get things done for free across your devices.


Get the free Outlook mobile app
The Outlook apps for iOS and Android are free. They

body.content:
Hi FYP,
Welcome to your Outlook! We're the email service designed to help you conquer your day. Connect, organize, and get things done for free across your devices.
Get the free Outlook mobile app
The Outlook apps for iOS and Android are free. They make using your various email accounts and calendars simple and consistent!
Use Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and OneDrive for free on the web
Do more with Microsoft 365 for free on the web right from within Outlook using your new Microsoft Account. Save all your important photos, videos, and documents in OneDrive with free storage.
Use Microsoft 365 for free
Write better emails
Use the advanced AI of Microsoft Editor, built into all of Outlook, to get suggestions as you type for impactful, clear, and mistake-free messages.
Personalize Outlook for your style
Choose a unique theme, use Outlook in Dark Mode, and create the ideal layout to have your inbox look and act how you want.
Pick a theme Change your inbox layout
Use your email and calendar together in one place
Outlook's built-in calendar and to-do list keeps track of appointments and events to help you have the time to prioritize people and life's precious events – even create a shared family calendar.
Visit calendar
Find what you need when you need it
Universal search in Outlook helps you find any message, contact, or document fast. Use folders, pin or flag emails, and archive to help you stay organized – even sweep away and block mail from unwanted senders forever.
Customize quick actions to stay organized
Backed by enterprise-grade security
Trust in Microsoft's security to help keep emails, documents, and treasured memories safe from phishing and scams. Outlook works around the clock to help protect your data.
Stay protected
Privacy Statement
Microsoft Corporation • One Microsoft Way • Redmond, WA 98052
You are receiving this welcome notification because you created an Outlook.com account
